title: Looking to Buy S-74 silks with paper backs

posts.post_title: Looking to Buy S-74 silks with paper backs
posts.post_content: Hello. I am searching for some s74-1 white silks that with paper ad backs. My list is fairly short for players I need but would consider some upgrades. I can out right buy or have stuff to trade like t206's and other tobacco for the right item. Thanks
